name: comprehensive
description: Comprehensive webhook dataset covering authentication, performance, infrastructure, features, bugs, and documentation

commits.message:
feat(auth): Add OAuth2 refresh token rotation

Implemented automatic token rotation on refresh for enhanced security.
Tokens now expire after 24 hours and refresh on each request.

head_commit.message:
feat(auth): Add OAuth2 refresh token rotation

Implemented automatic token rotation on refresh for enhanced security.
Tokens now expire after 24 hours and refresh on each request.

commits.message:
hotfix: Fix critical authentication bypass vulnerability

Patched CVE-2024-0001 in session validation logic.
Users should rotate their session tokens immediately.

head_commit.message:
hotfix: Fix critical authentication bypass vulnerability

Patched CVE-2024-0001 in session validation logic.
Users should rotate their session tokens immediately.

commits.message:
perf: Add Redis caching layer for API responses

Implemented Redis caching to reduce database load by 70%.
Cache TTL set to 5 minutes for dynamic content.

head_commit.message:
perf: Add Redis caching layer for API responses

Implemented Redis caching to reduce database load by 70%.
Cache TTL set to 5 minutes for dynamic content.

commits.message:
feat(infra): Add Datadog APM integration

Integrated Datadog for application performance monitoring.
Now tracking API latency, error rates, and custom metrics.

head_commit.message:
feat(infra): Add Datadog APM integration

Integrated Datadog for application performance monitoring.
Now tracking API latency, error rates, and custom metrics.

commits.message:
chore: Update CI/CD pipeline configuration

Migrated from CircleCI to GitHub Actions.
Added automated security scanning with Snyk.

head_commit.message:
chore: Update CI/CD pipeline configuration

Migrated from CircleCI to GitHub Actions.
Added automated security scanning with Snyk.

commits.message:
feat(ui): Redesign dashboard with new component library

Migrated to Radix UI components for better accessibility.
Implemented dark mode support across all pages.

head_commit.message:
feat(ui): Redesign dashboard with new component library

Migrated to Radix UI components for better accessibility.
Implemented dark mode support across all pages.

commits.message:
feat: Implement API key rotation mechanism

Added automatic API key rotation every 90 days.
Notifications sent 7 days before expiration.

head_commit.message:
feat: Implement API key rotation mechanism

Added automatic API key rotation every 90 days.
Notifications sent 7 days before expiration.

commits.message:
fix(config): Move secrets to environment variables

Removed hardcoded API keys from codebase.
Updated deployment docs with new env var requirements.

head_commit.message:
fix(config): Move secrets to environment variables

Removed hardcoded API keys from codebase.
Updated deployment docs with new env var requirements.

pull_request.title: feat(search): Implement full-text search with Elasticsearch
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Added Elasticsearch integration for improved search functionality.

## Changes
- New search service using Elasticsearch
- Migration script for existing data
- Search UI component improvements

Fixes #150

pull_request.title: fix: Resolve memory leak in WebSocket connections
pull_request.body:
## Problem
WebSocket connections not properly cleaned up on disconnect.

## Solution
- Added proper cleanup in disconnect handler
- Implemented connection pooling
- Added memory monitoring

Fixes #155

pull_request.title: feat: Add export functionality for reports
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Users can now export reports in PDF, Excel, and CSV formats.

## Changes
- PDF export using Puppeteer
- Excel export with formatting
- CSV export for raw data

Fixes #160

pull_request.title: fix: Correct pagination logic in user list endpoint
pull_request.body:
## Problem
Pagination returning incorrect results when using filters.

## Solution
- Fixed offset calculation
- Updated SQL query logic
- Added comprehensive tests

Fixes #165

pull_request.title: feat(security): Implement rate limiting middleware
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Added rate limiting to prevent API abuse.

## Changes
- Rate limit middleware using Redis
- Configurable limits per endpoint
- Rate limit headers in responses

Protects against DDoS attacks

pull_request.title: fix(perf): Optimize database queries in analytics
pull_request.body:
## Problem
Slow queries causing timeouts in analytics dashboard.

## Solution
- Added proper indexes
- Optimized JOIN operations
- Implemented query result caching

Reduced query time from 8s to 200ms

pull_request.title: feat: Add webhook support for external integrations
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Webhooks allow third-party services to receive real-time updates.

## Changes
- Webhook management UI
- Event subscription system
- Retry logic with exponential backoff

Supports Slack, Discord, and custom endpoints

pull_request.title: fix(security): Patch SQL injection vulnerability
pull_request.body:
## Critical Security Fix
SQL injection vulnerability in search endpoint.

## Changes
- Parameterized all SQL queries
- Added input sanitization
- Security audit completed

CVE-2024-0002 patched

pull_request.title: feat(docs): Add comprehensive API documentation
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Complete API documentation with examples and tutorials.

## Changes
- OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- Interactive API playground
- Code examples in multiple languages

Improves developer experience

pull_request.title: feat(infra): Implement auto-scaling for workers
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Auto-scaling based on queue depth and CPU usage.

## Changes
- Kubernetes HPA configuration
- Custom metrics from Prometheus
- Scale from 2 to 20 workers

Handles traffic spikes automatically

issue.title: Bug: Login form validation not working on mobile
issue.body:
## Problem
Form validation fails on mobile Safari and Chrome.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Open login page on mobile
2. Submit empty form
3. No validation errors shown

## Expected
Validation errors should display

## Environment
iOS 17, Android 13

issue.title: Feature Request: Dark mode support
issue.body:
## Request
Add dark mode theme option for better user experience.

## Use Case
Many users work in low-light environments and prefer dark themes.

## Suggestions
- System preference detection
- Manual toggle in settings
- Persist user choice

issue.title: Bug: Memory leak in file upload component
issue.body:
## Problem
Memory usage grows continuously during file uploads.

## Investigation
- Tested with 100MB files
- Memory not released after upload completes
- Suspect event listeners not cleaned up

## Impact
Browser crashes after multiple uploads

issue.title: Feature Request: Export data to Excel format
issue.body:
## Request
Users want to export dashboard data to Excel files.

## Requirements
- Preserve formatting
- Include charts as images
- Support large datasets (10k+ rows)

## Business Value
Frequently requested by enterprise customers

issue.title: Bug: Race condition in payment processing
issue.body:
## Problem
Race condition causes duplicate charges.

## Solution
Implemented idempotency keys and transaction locking.

## Resolution
Fixed in PR #410

issue.title: Feature Request: Two-factor authentication
issue.body:
## Request
Add 2FA support for enhanced security.

## Implementation
- TOTP support (Google Authenticator, Authy)
- SMS backup option
- Recovery codes

## Resolution
Implemented in v2.5.0

issue.title: Bug: Incorrect timezone handling in reports
issue.body:
## Problem
Reports show times in UTC instead of user timezone.

## Solution
Added timezone detection and conversion.

## Resolution
Fixed in PR #415

release.name: Version 2.5.0 - Security and Performance Release
release.body:
## What's New

### Security
- Two-factor authentication (TOTP)
- Rate limiting middleware
- SQL injection patches

### Performance
- Redis caching layer (70% reduction in DB load)
- Optimized database queries
- Worker auto-scaling

### Features
- Dark mode support
- Export to Excel
- Webhook integrations

## Breaking Changes
- API key rotation now required every 90 days
- Deprecated endpoints removed

## Migration Guide
See docs/migration-v2.5.md

release.name: Version 2.5.1 - Hotfix Release
release.body:
## Bug Fixes
- Fixed timezone handling in reports (#507)
- Resolved memory leak in file uploads (#503)
- Corrected pagination with filters (#304)

## Improvements
- Enhanced error messages
- Better logging for debugging

This is a recommended update for all v2.5.0 users.

hotfix: Fix critical authentication bypass vulnerability
perf: Add Redis caching layer for API responses
feat(ui): Redesign dashboard with new component library
feat: Implement API key rotation mechanism
fix(config): Move secrets to environment variables
